name: Refrigerator LG GR-X267CSHS Silver
origAbout: InstaView Door-in-Door™ has a sleek mirrored glass panel that illuminates with two quick knocks, allowing you to see inside the easy access compartment without ever opening the door, reducing cold air loss to help keep food fresher longer. SpacePlus™ Ice System - door-mounted slim ice maker provides more storage space in freezer part. Utility Box - the optimal space for smaller items such as deli, and cheese in the proper temperature. With a simple switch, FRESHBalancer™ keeps your vegetables and fruits in its optimal condition respectively by adjusting the right amount of humidity.

details.name: Annual Energy Consumption (kW/Year), kilowatt per hour per Year
